REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f5005 reute d f BC-ADAMS-RUSSELL-ELECTRO 03-17 0055

TEXT.TITLE: ADAMS-RUSSELL ELECTRONICS <AARE> IN PURCHASE
TEXT.BODY: Adams-Russell Electronics Co Inc said it has acquired Hermetronics PLC, a maker of hermetic integrated circuit packages, for about 600,000 dlrs. The company said HErmetronics is expected to have sales of over 800,000 dlrs for the year ending this month. Reuter
